subject: Football
Sex Crimes
lead_paragraph: Darren Sharper, the former all-pro N.F.L. safety, pleaded no contest to drugging and raping two women in Los Angeles as part of a broader plea deal.
snippet: Darren Sharper, the former all-pro N.F.L. safety, pleaded no contest to drugging and raping two women in Los Angeles as part of a broader plea deal.
